snippet: Slim Kallas, the E.U.'s top transport official, hinted at legal action if Washington did not grant the license to the budget carrier's American subsidiary.
lead_paragraph: Slim Kallas, the E.U.'s top transport official, hinted at legal action if Washington did not grant the license to the budget carrier's American subsidiary.

headline.main: E.U. Official Criticizes U.S. Move Against Norwegian Air
headline.print_headline: E.U. Official Criticizes U.S. Rejection of License for Norwegian Air
